title: Design and Operational Strategies for Online Formative Assessment in Pandemic Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Short intensive course conducted in a BYOD environment for current professionals in the science field

learning_goals: Participants can explicitly incorporate general competency assessment elements when designing online formative assessments in pandemic situations.
Participants can establish integrated operational strategies for formative and summative assessments in LMS-based asynchronous environments.
Participants can resolve practical issues that arise when designing assessments using digital technology.

resources: LMS Platform (Quiz, Discussion Board, Portfolio Features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
